YubiKey Authentication
What is a YubiKey Security Key?
sdfghjh44s5daf45vzxe45twaas4f5s6
  1. Download a supported Two-factor Authenticator App from the Apple App Store or the Google Play Store
  2. Open the Authenticator App and create a new account
  3. Scan the QR code on this page
  4. Enter the Security Code in the field below and click Verify Code
Congratulations, youre authenticated with 2FA
